mapper.select: select b.id as roleId from sys_user_role_relation a inner join sys_role b on a.role_id = b.id where a.user_id = #{id} and a.del_flag = 0
select c.name as name, c.sort as sort, c.id as id from sys_role a inner join sys_role_menu b on a.id = b.role_id inner join sys_menu c on b.menu_id = c.id where a.id = #{id} and b.del_flag = 0
select count(0) from sys_user a left join sys_user_role_relation b on a.id = b.user_id left join sys_role c on b.role_id = c.id where c.name = #{name}

select a.id as userId, (rechargeTotal + ifnull(e.commissionTotal, 0) + ifnull(d.incomeTotal, 0)) - (ifnull(f.grabToal, 0) - ifnull(g.withdrawTotal, 0)) as amoun, ifnull(c.rechargeTotal,0) as rechargeTotal, ifnull(d.incomeTotal,0) as incomeTotal, a.login_way as loginWay, a.del_flag as delFlag, b.ip as ip, b.create_date as endDate from sys_user a left join (select ip,create_by,create_date from sys_login_detail group by create_by, create_date order by create_date desc limit 1) b on a.id = b.create_by left join (select create_by,sum(amount) as rechargeTotal from recharge_detail where pay_status = '2' and del_flag = '0' group by create_by) c on a.id = c.create_by left join (select create_by,sum(amount) as incomeTotal from sys_user_account where type = '1' and spending = '0' and del_flag = '0' group by create_by) d on a.id = d.create_by left join (select create_by,sum(amount) as commissionTotal from sys_user_account where type = '0' and spending ='0' and del_flag = '0' group by create_by) e on a.id = e.create_by left join (select create_by,sum(amount) as grabToal from sys_user_account where type = '2' and spending = '1' and del_flag = '0' group by create_by) f on a.id = f.create_by left join (select create_by,sum(amount) as withdrawTotal from sys_user_account where type = '3' and spending ='1' and audit = '3' and del_flag = '0' group by create_by) g on a.id = g.create_by where 1=1
and a.id = #{request.userId}
or a.account = #{request.account}
or a.phone = #{request.phone}
and a.del_flag = #{request.delFlag}
and date_format(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{request.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{request.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by amount
order by amount desc
order by rechargeTotal
order by rechargeTotal desc
order by incomeTotal
order by incomeTotal desc
order by endDate
order by endDate desc

select b.id as id, b.amount as amount, a.amount as winningAmount, b.create_date as createDate, a.create_date as lotteryAmount from lottery_detail a inner join grab_red_packets b on a.grab_red_packets_id = b.id where b.create_by = #{request.userId}

select a.phone, b.ip, a.account, b.create_date from sys_user a left join (select ip, create_by, create_date from sys_login_detail order by create_date desc limit 1) b on a.id = b.create_by where a.id = #{id}
